features.additionalInfo: Access to online banking through iBank and Hume Bank's App
Flexible Repayments - weekly, fortnightly or monthly

eligibility.additionalInfo: Maximum Loan to Value Ratio of 95%

eligibility.additionalValue: Must be an Australian resident or citizen

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply

fees.name: LBAPPFEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is a once off charge for a liteBlue application

fees.name: TITLEPRODFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to produce the title to you or another credit provider

fees.name: TITLESEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you undertake a title search in relation to any security

fees.name: SETTLEMENTATTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are required to attend any settlement on your behalf

fees.name: SEARCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we undertake any search in relation to your company or business at ASIC

fees.name: PROGPAYMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the 8th and any subsequent drawdown on a construction loan

fees.name: PHOTOCOPYFEE
fees.additionalInfo: $3 per page. Payable when you ask us to photocopy documents for you

fees.name: DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when any security is wholly or partially discharged.

fees.name: REDRAW
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time you request a cashback on your loan over the counter. For all loans apart from Interest Saver loans, this fee is waived for the first cashback requested each month. This fee does not apply if your request is processed via IBank

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to consent to a second mortgage on any security

fees.name: DEFAULTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the last day of each month during which there is an amount overdue for payment on your loan.

fees.name: AGENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we need to instruct an agent in connection with the settlement of your loan

fees.name: CHQFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each cheque required on settlement in excess of five (5) cheques

fees.name: DUPLICATESTATEMENTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: $2 per page of statement produced. Payable when you ask us to produce duplicate statements for you.

fees.name: LANDTITLE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request us to produce a title deed

fees.name: LEGALCOSTS
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we pay our solicitors as a result of your application for a variabtion to, discharge of or our consent to any variation of your agreement or security

fees.name: SECURITYSEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we need to search a register in relation to any security

fees.name: VALFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we have to pay a valuer as a result of your application for our consent to any matter relating to this agreement or the security, a variation of the agreement or security, or for a progress payment under a construction loan

fees.name: CONTRACTVARIATIONFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in the event we agree to vary your loan agreement

fees.name: SWITCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert from one interest rate option to another. This fee is in addition to any break costs payable

fees.name: DISHONOURFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a direct debit from another account to your loan is declined or a cheque deposited to your loan account is dishonoured

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated daily and applied monthly

data.name: liteBlue O/Occ I/O (90%-95% LVR)
data.description: A straight up low rate home loan that's easy to understand. With perks that make sense, like no ongoing fees and free online redraw.
